column1: We will run a search for papers that 'study bees' [see "word cloud input" tab] and are in 'agriculture' with our search terms listed in the keywords, title, or abstract. Then we will (1) use the purple project criteria below to narrow down paper count; (2) use the green measurement criteria below to further refine; and (3) use the yellow reporting criteria below to get a final paper count. Finally, we will document what the paper measured (white columns) in order to bin the papers into hypothesis types.
